page.title: 09A Dagenham Local Newspaper
page.content: {A visit to the Dagenham Post The{newspaper}is 61 years old and has had different names in the past. Its editor, John Clarke, has a team of 5 reporters, 4 photographers and 3 sports writers. His day starts at 8.15 when he opens the post. This takes a few hours because he has people coming to see him and the phone ringing all the time. He had a meeting at 9.30 about the{free papers}that come through the letter box. Because the Dagenham Post costs 15p, there has been a drop in sales. This week 29OOO copies were sold. The main story this week was the{murder}of a boy outside Lautrec's Club after a fight. After the meeting, he writes letters and phones people about{advertisements. They can cost Â£2OO. His day finishes at about 1O.3Opm. Jackie Deacon, Class 2, Chadwell Primary School.
